name: Alight, Inc.
description: Alight, Inc. is a leading provider of technology-enabled health, wealth, and workforce solutions. Founded in 2020 and headquartered in Lincolnshire, Illinois, Alight aims to transform how organizations manage their employee benefits and workforce strategies. The company leverages advanced analytics and digital solutions to optimize the employee experience, providing comprehensive services that include health benefits administration, retirement plan services, and workforce management solutions. Alight’s platform integrates data and technology to deliver personalized experiences for employees, helping them make informed decisions about their health and financial wellness. With a focus on innovation, Alight is committed to enhancing organizational effectiveness through superior employee engagement and benefits optimization. The company’s mission is to make the world a healthier and more secure place by empowering employees to take control of their well-being and financial future. By utilizing a combination of technology and human expertise, Alight supports organizations in navigating the complexities of employee benefits and workforce management in an ever-evolving landscape.
